ComicInfo.Title: Green Screen; The Brutal Sword of Leonardo; The Flame that Fuels You; Identity Theft
ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Black, White & Green
ComicInfo.Summary: It’s the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles like you’ve never seen them before! This special series gathers up some of comics’ most eclectic and exciting talent to bring their takes on TMNT to the page, taking the characters back to their origins in black-and-white independent comics…but with a touch of green! Thrill to all-new adventures by the likes of Paulina Ganucheau (Wonder Woman: The Adventures of Young Diana), Declan Shalvey (Deadpool vs. Old Man Logan, Moon Knight), and more. With covers by Shalvey, Ganucheau, and superstar James Stokoe (Orc Stain; Godzilla: The Half-Century War)!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 20:54:54. [CVDB1054521]
ComicInfo.Writer: Dave Baker, Declan Shalvey, Gigi Dutreix, Jesse Lonergan, Lorenzo Hall, Paulina Ganucheau
ComicInfo.Penciller: Declan Shalvey, Gigi Dutreix, Jesse Lonergan, Paulina Ganucheau
ComicInfo.Inker: Declan Shalvey, Gigi Dutreix, Jesse Lonergan, Paulina Ganucheau
ComicInfo.Colorist: Declan Shalvey, Gigi Dutreix, Jesse Lonergan, Paulina Ganucheau
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dan Berger, Declan Shalvey, James Stokoe, Paris Alleyne, Paulina Ganucheau
ComicInfo.Editor: Jamie S. Rich, Maggie Howell, Nicolas Niño, Thea Cheuk
ComicInfo.Characters: Casey Jones, Donatello, Leatherhead, Leonardo, Master Splinter, Michelangelo, Raphael, Shredder
